vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) wrong, wickedness, guilt
1a) wickedness (as violence and crime against civil law)
1b) wickedness (of enemies)
1c) wickedness (in ethical relations)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   ser culpable; (b) hif.   hallar culpable, condenar; (c)   obrar malvadamente
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 邪惡
1a) 邪惡 (違反民法的犯罪暴力行為)
1b) 邪惡 (敵人的)
1c) 邪惡 (倫理關係上)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 邪恶
1a) 邪恶 (违反民法的犯罪暴力行为)
1b) 邪恶 (敌人的)
1c) 邪恶 (伦理关系上)
